website_summaries.verdict: It is a good product for the price, and has very sturdy construction.
pros: It has a very stable base
The springs are fabric protected and give very good bounce
The music effect is cute and fun, and parents have said it brings a laugh to even them
cons: The toys are not as interesting to babies, according to reviews
The product is for taller babies and those with shorter legs cannot reach the ground

customer_reviews.title: Great Bouncer at a great price love it !
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 8 month old baby she weights 19 pounds and is 24 inches tall. Love it because it is very easy to assemble and haves 3 high levels and has a lot of fun toys attached to play with, makes a kool noise and lights up too and does a 360 turn around and the best parts its I unisex jumper/bouncer so when she grows out of it I can pass it on to a baby girl or a baby boy .PS My baby girl loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Defective light and sound panel.
customer_reviews.text: Put the Jumperoo together and last item that was installed was the light and sound panel. Upon placing my daughter in the Jumperoo and switching on the panel it did not work, did the 'reset' option, again didn't work, checked batteries which were okay, then put a multi-meter on the circuit boards and both circuit boards don't work! Seeing I reside in the Philippines I can not get a replacement part or refund as it would cost more to return the item and receive a new one. So, if you reside outside US, don't bother with this product, look for another brand and another supplier/deliverer. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: DaLooney

customer_reviews.title: we had the rain-forest one with out middle child and i think im beginning to like this one much better
customer_reviews.text: my little man loves his new jumper. we had the rain-forest one with out middle child and i think im beginning to like this one much better. i especially like the shape of the bottom support much better. The Rain-forest one is a full circle while this one is much narrower and a better shape. I can fit this much easier in smaller spaces as well as fit it down our narrow hallways.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We previously owned the original version of this when our first daughter was a baby. She loved it so much, we were excited to get this for our second daughter. The only qualm I ever had with the original was that it was rather cumbersome to move between rooms as it didn't fit through doorways. This version has updated the footprint from a circle to this triangle shape, and also boasts easily removable polls that allow you to take it apart if need be, or for storage. It arrived well packaged and takes about 5 minutes to assemble (the hardest part was removing all of the protective wrapping from the pieces). We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MPA

customer_reviews.title: Poor design!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this. We started putting this together and one part, the hanging leaf with the animal on it wasn’t even for this product.(the piece didn’t even come close to fitting) When putting the seat together this says “if it will not spin freely you have not put it together correct”, well when your seat will not clip in because of the design. Safety hazard for the child. Sent it back. Including a picture of where the seat did not fit in the clips and one of the leaf.
customer_reviews.author: T&P

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy - not badly priced.
customer_reviews.text: It bounces well and has some cute little toys attached. Wasn't difficult to assemble. A bit of a monstrosity with how much room it takes up, but my son loves it! I feel like it was a good purchase for the price. I do wish the lowest height setting was just a little lower - my son couldn't quite reach the floor at 6 months old (either not tall enough or not heavy enough to weigh it down). He was about 27 inches and 16 lbs but has since "grown into it" and can reach the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Girl

customer_reviews.title: A little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The base of the jumper was a bit difficult to shove into place and I couldn't tell from the instructions if I was putting the seat insert backwards. But by experience you should know or be able to tell which is the right way. Once it is fully assembled it feels a little wobbly, but I'm assuming it's like that for the purpose of jumping. We played with it before putting baby in just to make sure though. All is well and it's her favorite thing in the world right now.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: the underside is pretty scratch too
customer_reviews.text: it came dented.. and the shipping box was undamaged.. so... it was packed up broken to begin with. be ware. the underside is pretty scratch too.. so you will want to cover it up with something like duct tape.. (classy, right?) before you think to put your baby in it. OR.. you could just not make the mistake I did.. and don't buy the thing. go get it at target or walmart.. same cost anyway.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: The green leaves at the top that hold the toys bend very easily and the green plastic turns white
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. NOT WORTH $100. The green leaves at the top that hold the toys bend very easily and the green plastic turns white. The seat, no matter how many times I put the cover on and placed it in the middle, the seat WOULD NOT SPIN. Also, I could muscle it and pull the seat out, it wouldn't latch into place. I wouldn't buy this ever again. I wish I had pictures, returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Bouncing babies!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this, especially the music and crocodile spinner. I wish the seat was easier to rotate so she could spin herself to get to the other toys, but maybe she just isn’t strong enough yet. Not sure I’d ever take this apart and try to travel with it, but’s it’s sturdy and uses push-clips instead of screws. Don’t forget the batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kaffenberger

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, crap product!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it gets 2 stars is due to the easy assembly. Its not sturdy at all. The thing is so wobbly! And the seat doesn’t work. The wheels aren’t round, so the baby can’t spin in the seat to get to everything like it does on our old one. I bought this one to stay at my house and the old one went to my mothers. Now I’m regretting that decision! Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mahayla Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for babies!
customer_reviews.text: This was used by my daughter and my son, My daughter loved it and my 6 month old is using it now. It's great to use while we are eating and keeps him entertained and happy! My only problem with it was the teething toy was attached by a strap that eventually unraveled and had to be removed. Otherwise, great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I returned this jumper. The leaves that hang from above bend very easily. The ones I received appeared used and were already showing signs of wear and breakage at the joint. If baby pulls on these enough they WILL break. Also the 360 degree seat is very hard to spin. I just wasn’t impressed with the quality and decided to return and try a different jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Price difference matters
customer_reviews.text: We originally got the rainforest jumperoo but it came with many warped parts so we traded it for this one. I can tell this one is a little more cheaply made and the bouncing sounds are pretty obnoxious, wish it was songs instead. I am regretting trading for this one but to be honest Amazon was so difficult with the return that I’m giving up and keeping this one.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Our sons favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing!! He jumps and jumps and jumps for a while and laughs his head off. The frame holds him just fine (he’s only 15.5 lbs so I would hope so) but I gave it less stars because it just snaps together and seems a little unsturdy even though it holds him. Just makes me a little uneasy but I guess that’s to make it fit in the box. My husband put it together so it had to be pretty easy to put together, no tools necessary. All in all my husband says this is one of the best purchases I’ve ever made because of how much our son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 3 stars because the leaves that are holding the monkey and elephant are not spring loaded. When my 6 month old grandson pulled on them the plastic bent and won't go back up. The plastic seemed to have broke. Some of the toys are only for looks no interaction. The ones that are interactive he really enjoys. The bouncy seat is great. He loves to bounce!
customer_reviews.author: GrammaD

customer_reviews.title: Completely different than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Complete eyesore which I was expecting with the bright colors but it is VERY brown. And it’s completely different than pictures. The height adjustment is under the seat not on the sides and is impossible to get in the highest setting. The arms also bow out really far and the 360 seat is impossible for the babies to turn around in. We have another FP jumper that isn’t available on amazon anymore that we love and we needed a second for the kiddo we’re fostering, this jumper sadly misses the mark. Returning it and going to try a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie White

customer_reviews.title: Great to grow in
customer_reviews.text: The child I bought this for was three months old when I purchased the Jumperoo. He is niw 4 months and enjoys the music, amazed by the lights, and plays with the animals. He is discovering more all of the time. He can also bounce in it!
customer_reviews.author: it's another pop quiz

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good jumper, but I was disappointed that it arrived without the piece to hold the batteries in place. My son never got to enjoy the sounds and music because the batteries wouldn’t stay in place without that piece. It had multiple scratches and some of the spinning toys looks old and used. I guess for the price it was ok, but disappointing when you order something new and it looks used.
customer_reviews.author: Hilla

customer_reviews.title: PandemicPurchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this to be able to work from home with my baby during pandemic, it has really been a lifesaver and given my son great entertainment/exercise. It’s a little challenging for him to spin the seat though but I think we just need to break it in a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hartner

customer_reviews.title: If that could be made to glide a bit better this would be five stars
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves the Jumperoo even though she's still on the shorter side to use it. We simply placed some oversized books on the floor beneath her so her feet can touch the ground well (the jumper itself is still on the solid ground). She loves the spinning wheels, hanging toys and noisemaking toys. The only complaint I have is that the jumper is supposed to rotate 360 degrees so she can turn as she pleases, but the actual mechanism takes quite a bit of effort to turn. If that could be made to glide a bit better this would be five stars.
customer_reviews.author: KeckMan

customer_reviews.title: a litttle tall.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it's a little high. My 5 month old is a sitter and he's in the 75th-80th percentile in length and he still doesn't quite reach his feet to the ground without me putting something down there for him to stand on. I love it otherwise. I'm surprised the lowest setting is as high as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Anoxinamun

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed in this product..... the base is flimsy and my husband had to bend and hammer some times on it so that It didn't shake like crazy. The two leafs that go in the top are now bent after my 6 month old grabbed and yanked on them both. It is cheaply constructed in my opinion and I am slightly concerned for my son's safety. I might be returning it (which is such a headache). I am surprised that this is a Fisher price product considering that I have many Fisher price items and I have never had an issues before.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Missing many parts- not able to put it together properly
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Not as described. Many pieces missing. ALL of the toys and electronic pieces were NOT included in packaging. No toys included. See pictures for details. This was to be baby's main Christmas gift and we were not able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Middleton Fam

customer_reviews.title: Every mama needs this
customer_reviews.text: So great! Keeps baby entertained and mama gets to get stuff done now. Our 6 month old loves even just sitting in it and looking at the toys when she's not jumping. It's been life changing for me to get stuff done around the house. I'll be so sad when she outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Interactive fun for baby
customer_reviews.text: Great interactive toy. My son just loves this. He laughs and bounces. He plays with all the different parts. It’s so wonderful to see him laughing and playing like that. This is by far his favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: sls

customer_reviews.title: My LO enjoys it.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old is now 7 months and loves playing/bouncing in it everyday! Be careful to put pads beneath your LO feet to protect their little toes. My LO is in the 98th percentile and has already graduated to the highest 3rd height. There's a weight limit of 25 lbs and she is closing in. But being she doesn't BOUNCE excessively on it. I may push the weight limit. Will update. Cons: The mirror elephant and toys next to it are useless. Doesn't do anything and LO can't even see herself. They should've at least be pushable buttons or the likes.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi C

customer_reviews.title: Happy we got have this!
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't "love" it as much as my nearly 5 month old. She likes to stand and watch and see, not sit or lay down and so I decided this would be right-up-her alley. And she has a blast so far with this, she gets to move and groove and the music sounds pretty good (rather then those super cheap noises from other baby machines) My husband put this together in about 15 minutes and she has a big ole smile on her face while she hangs out. I just wonder what will happen when she learns about gravity.
customer_reviews.author: RadVan

customer_reviews.title: Spinny toys don't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Toy add ons that you assemble yourself, basically you just push them into the spots they're supposed to be in, always fall off no matter how hard I press them into place. Other than that my baby enjoys jumping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Brinca, Brinca!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves to jump! He keeps entertained, it caught his attention without it being overwhelming with all the attachments, his favorites are the monkey and the rhino hanging over the palm tree. He's not a big fan of the teether, but its a good attachment, its a little lion and its just cute to have on there. It is a fair price, although I wouldn't buy it for a baby over 12 months, it may be too small for them.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca M.

customer_reviews.title: the product was delivered timely and the package in wonderful condition. It took my husband about 20 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old is only 26.5" long. This is on the lowest setting and we have to fold a blanket up and put it under her feet so she can jump properly - otherwise the tips of her toes just skim the floor, but she is only in the jumperoo while supervised. Hope this helps parents with height. Other than she needs to grow a little, the product was delivered timely and the package in wonderful condition. It took my husband about 20 minutes to put it together. It looks just like the picture and everything works properly. Our daughter enjoys the jumperoo!
customer_reviews.author: WMcNair

customer_reviews.title: 4 month old baby girl looooves it!
customer_reviews.text: Had a jumperoo slightly different from this one, but the same brand, for my first daughter. It was her favorite thing to play with when she was little-she would literally jump herself to sleep sometimes! My second daughter is now enjoying this jumperoo (she is 4 months old). She actually asks (in her baby/nonverbal ways, of course) to be put in the jumper all the time! She doesn't like the noises to be turned on just yet, I think maybe it is overwhelming for her or something...but she will jump and play with the toys for pretty long spurts!
customer_reviews.author: LanneyG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but quite large
customer_reviews.text: I did tons of research before buying a jumper for my daughter. We love this one but it is huge! It takes up a whole corner of our living room. It has 3 height settings and multiple toys for interaction from your little one. I don't find the music it plays too annoying or loud either. However when she really gets jumping it's loud as she's moving the whole center piece. The seat easily swivels and easy to remove for cleaning. It was very easy to assemble, at first I felt the arms didn't feel sturdy as they give when touched but it's perfectly fine when she's jumping.
customer_reviews.author: wildcats7

customer_reviews.title: Great, but seat is stiff and doesn't turn easily.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for my baby to bounce in, but didn't like a Johnny Jump Up because of how unstable they felt, so decided to buy this product, and I love it. Fairly simple set up, unfortunately the seat doesn't turn great and is stiff. Also, set it at the lowest setting and my daughter's feet still don't touch the floor. Will take a while for her to grow into. It does keep her entertained and she loves all the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: great toy at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my 5 month old and she loves it! We have it on the lowest level and she's able to touch just enough to bounce a little. I like that she'll be able to grow with this for quite while. Oh, and if your hoping to eat dinner without holding a fussy baby every night, this works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: kj9112

customer_reviews.title: when she can really jump she will love it even more
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old granddaughter LOVES it. She is just able to reach the floor so I'm guessing in another month, when she can really jump she will love it even more. My only issue, If you can call it an issue, Is while unwrapping it, I broke one of the strings that hole to little toys to the "leaf" covers on top. Those string are so short that I wasn't able to re-attach it. I intend to replace all the string with longer ones so that the can actually reach the hanging toys. But so far, I think this was WELL worth the cost and expect to get much more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: pollyester

customer_reviews.title: Zoo Jumperoo
customer_reviews.text: As described. Prompt delivery. My baby granddaughter Kayla loved this from the moment I put her in it. She started jumping right away, and didn't stop for at least an hour. i was getting worried for her feet she jumped so long. she's only 9 months. I had her on a rug, but I wish there was a soft mat for it. I put a piece of memory foam down. She loves this item! But then that's why I purchased it she loved to jump.
customer_reviews.author: S. Desroches

customer_reviews.title: He I getting close to the weight limit on it but it's still got another height adjustment to go and it is so sturdy I will have
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest most entertaining toy I have had the pleasure of owning for any of my five kids. I smile as I walk past my 6 month old jumping his little heart out and though I try to limit his time left in the jumparoo he has been entertained without interruption for up to 2 hours in it. His little feet start kicking the minute he sees it. He I getting close to the weight limit on it but it's still got another height adjustment to go and it is so sturdy I will have no problems keeping him in it past the suggested limits. Worth every penny you will spend in the first week you own it!
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids jumping for several months
customer_reviews.text: The kids love jumping in this with the music playing and the lights going off. It was a good purchase for the Grandchildren, 2 of them have really enjoyed it so far, I hope for many more.
customer_reviews.author: tgpifer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: my baby loves this!!!! it's springy and easy for him to jump. loves the different toys... the rhino bumps him in the head sometimes when he is jumping but he doesn't notice lol. this thing has made making dinner, vacuuming, getting dressed, and the basic things in life possible for me to do without holding him in one arm. I love it. my son loves it. it has room to grow. you ( whoever you are ) should get it, especially for the 78 bucks I paid. costs more in store in the u.s. costs WAAAAY more in store in canada. fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all the toys my daughter can interact with
customer_reviews.text: Love all the toys my daughter can interact with. Super easy to put together and has three different lengths you can adjust to. There is music that has two different levels on the volume as well as what plays. One is a continuous noise that can get annoying. lol. Love how the monkey and hippo are hanging and my daughter can reach for them. Also love that there is a teething toy that is attached so she can't drop it on the ground. Very good price compared to what similar items at toys r us go for (paid half the price to what is sold there).
customer_reviews.author: Alise

customer_reviews.title: One CRAZY, FUN Bouncer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter 8 mos (small for her age) is so crazy about this toy, it's just so funny! She bounces, squeals and laughs, just like we hoped she would! it's not too noisy bec the music can be adjusted, and it doesn't clank loudly when she bounces around. Very happy with our purchase. Adding to first review: 2nd grandchild is nuts over this toy, too! She's only 5 months old, but she bounces for hours of fun. Perfect for that stage when they don't walk yet, but they don't want to lay around or sit in a fixed chair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caffery

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: well i had to send this back because it was so wobbly :( i recently got the rain forest one and love it but i wanted one for my in-laws house as well so i thought i would get a different one but i felt very uncomfortable with my little one in this. Although the toys seemed fun. i believe it was not sturdy because of the triangle base, the other one i have is a circle base and is much more secure!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: this little jumperoo is super cute and the quality is great. in my opinion the "activities" are a little bit boring and the hanging animals hang a little bit too high for the baby to actually enjoy. the music could use more variety and it would have been nice if the lights were closer to view for baby also the giraffe is cute but does nothing but look cute....if anyone knows babies, they start to like to do things on their own pretty young...(example...4 month old), but this jumperoo doesn't adjust enough to the floor to touch, have to wedge a pillow under feet, but I'm hoping as she gets older she will enjoy it more and not be bored.
customer_reviews.author: NanaX's4!

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: She fits great , but the product came broken. A wire was split so no sound. It also came missing the screws for the music part.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: better than using a doorway hanger by a mile and ...
customer_reviews.text: my son was 3 months old when he first got to play in it and was excited and knew how to bounce since day one!!!! he is 4 and a half months now and he still is in his bouncer DAILY. only problem is I have to put a pillow underneath because his little toes can barely touch the ground still. but worth every penny still!!! better than using a doorway hanger by a mile and I didn't want him in a walker because that scares me it will delay his walking since it encourages tip toeing to walk. best money spent ever!
customer_reviews.author: mellisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for baby... gives time to momma
customer_reviews.text: All I know is my child has a blast in this and for that I give it a 5star. Easy to put together... pretty sturdy....lots of bright colors.. great stimulation.. My only wish/complaint is that everything is plastic. I wish someone would make one with cotton or more natural materials less toxic to babies. Also I had an issue with the order and Amazon took care of it immediately. They solved it right away. Best customer service ever. I recommend you buy it here
customer_reviews.author: Parinaz

customer_reviews.title: Fischer Price has nicer models than this one.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got a different FP bouncer chair and its so much nicer than this one. The seat is hard to turn, The hanging toys are too high for the baby to reach on this item dont love it. My daughters has more activities and everything is within the babies reach. There are several different models. Choose wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Must have for an active baby
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this! My son really didnt like swings- he would stay in one for no more than minutes- very different than what most people say about their babies. My husband and I noticed that our son was very active always kicking his legs so I wanted something he could use his legs even at such a young age and this was perfect! He loves the colors, lights, and music. A must have if you have a very active baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncy seat
customer_reviews.text: I took lots of time reading thru all the reviews for multiple bouncy/activity seats for babies. I wanted to make sure I got the right one for our 9 month ol that has a lot of developmental delays. This seat turned out to be perfect; VERY bouncy, has a lot of activities, the seat turns completely around and seems very comfortable, and is very sturdy. I am very pleased with the seat and my son enjoys bouncing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen & Trista Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. My baby is 10 lbs below the max weight and it slams hard when she jumps. The springs aren't very strong. It creaks and the bottom moves when she moves or jumps like an uneven table would. It seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: It's kind of hard leaving a review from a baby's standpoint
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sixth month old granddaughter. My daughter in law says her feet don't quite hit the floor yet to be able to bounce around and really have fun with it. But she does like all the bells and whistles. Keeps her quite occupied. She's at that age where she grabs at everything and it makes it's way in her mouth lol. I guess that's challenging enough when toy's don't come off lol. But over all, it's a nice toy for her. It won't be long before she grows a little more and she'll be bouncing all over the place like my other granddaughter did. And this shipping was fast also. Gotta love that!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Luv U Zoo Jumperoo
customer_reviews.text: I choose this product because my son loves to jump and touch gadget & he loves the gadgets on this one (the Cd looking gadget he takes it off easy so its always off. I attached it back on and his little fingers takes it off again lol) he is entertained hours at a time but I take him out of it when he jump him self to fall asleep. This Jumperoo saved my shoulder from falling off me. Lol I like it because of the 3 height settings, the choices of boink sound or music. Very easy to dismantle or install. The price was also affordable. I recommend this product to those who have babies that likes to jump
customer_reviews.author: Sapatos

customer_reviews.title: Buy it ; good quality good pricing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my niece and it didn’t fail. My little niece loves jumping up and down and loves the sounds it makes . Def a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: try before you buy, if possible
customer_reviews.text: finally started using the jumparoo & am very disappointed to report that the 6-7 month old doesn't like it. he doesn't even last 10 minutes in there before getting annoyed & wanting to come out. i wanted a fun place to put him while i cook/clean, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Bach

customer_reviews.title: One of the best out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 month old (who is 15 pounds) because she is an active baby. After doing quite a bit a research on bouncers I came upon this one and I am glad I did. Positives: Easy to put together( 5-10 mintues), baby bounces very well, has many toys(would like to see more teethers though), good stability and has 3 adjustable heights and seat moves 360 degrees. Negatives: The two plastic leaves on the top are very fragile and didnt last long. Wish it had more teethers because my daughter is not very interested in the toys it features. A great toy for a baby to occupy themselves for a few minutes everyday. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: E & M

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute jumperoo...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this jumperoo, but most importantly my 4 month old baby girl seems to love it too. I just received it today, and was able to put it together easily by myself. It's exactly what I expected and it arrived in perfect condition. Her feet cannot reach the floor yet, but based on the reviews I've read, I wasn't surprised. Her pediatrician said as long her feet are either dangling or able to be flat on the floor, she's fine. Also, that she shouldn't be jumping up on her toes because it can cause her to be a toe walker later on. Just an FYI.... 😉
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca  Solis

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed with this product because it is super flimsy. The brown tubes seem loose and the toys come off if you bearly pull on them. The green leaves are loose as well. We bought a similar jumper for our first (also Fisher-Price) and that one was very sturdy so comparing it to this one.... the quality on this sucks. Wish I could return it buy we through all packaging away before setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: X.Diamantoulis

customer_reviews.title: Defects and shortcomings, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: First unit received sent back due to missing part -- 2nd time out of 2 that this has happened with FP products. It took 5 minutes for baby to start eating the little pinwheel that has a sticker on it as decoration. Obviously any 6-12 month old will put anything it can reach in its mouth and obviously this sticker will come off in that baby's mouth. We ripped off the piece. Other than that, he loves it. It's junky and doesn't seem to be built to last, but it is a nice diversion and keeps him contained for a little bit so our hands are free.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew271828

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! my son is 6 months old so interested to jump in it, it gives me 10 min of hands free, i started seat him inside just for 5 min when he was about 4 months old, when he was ready to stand up a little and hold his head, he wasn't jumping but somehow seated vertical, under his feet i put a pillow because he couldn't reach the floor yet. And now , every corner of this jumper is under his attention, YOU must get it, if you want to change your laundry, or to cook something and to see a joy on baby's face!!!
customer_reviews.author: in..

customer_reviews.title: My son has been using this since he was almost ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this since he was almost 3 months old (now 4 months old) and IT HASN'T gotten old to him. I have two actually, since I live in AK and FL. Yea, don't ask. Anyway- he's obsessed. 2ThumbsUp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this for our four month old son. He absolutely loves jumping in it. It is great to build up the muscles in his legs and is safer than putting baby in a walker since it is stationary. I will say however it is a little disappointing that it doesn't have more interactive toys on it in regard to noises besides baby laughs etc. It is also a little difficult to get our son into the jumparoo sometimes but It can grow with baby via height so more pros than cons in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old son loves this jumperoo.Inever had one with my 2 oldest so it was a must have now that this is our last child ; ) I had issues with the bottom frame being uneven but I reassemble it and is stable. Thanks to all the lovely mommas on here who answered my questions , I appreciate the feedback.We have our jumper set to 1 because his feet dont don't floor just tippy toes so we use a pillow underneath. Absolutely adore it and toys are simple not overwhelming: ) I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. After owning it for about a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. After owning it for about a month my daughter is just now starting to get it. We started her young. She's still a bit small at 5 months so we put a pillow under her feet. She hasn't quite figured out the bounce yet but I'm sure that's coming soon. Keeps her occupied for a good 15 minutes. It's a good alternative to the swing. I like to rotate her from tummy time, bouncy chair, and swing when I cannot always hold her myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Kmaster

customer_reviews.title: Very good, Childrem Love it...
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 of this...very good for children. They love it. Do explain why you liked or disliked this product. Do compare to similar products and share how long you've used this product. Do identify specific attributes (e.g. comfort & fit of a shirt or the battery life of a camera) and whether they met your expectations. Don't describe your seller or shipping experience (you can do that at amazon.com/feedback). Don't include promotional content of any kind or reviews written in exchange for compensation.
customer_reviews.author: Andre L. B. Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Only a couple of issues
customer_reviews.text: This jumper is very good overall. My son loves to jump in it for as long as we will let him. We don't turn on the sounds because he gets overly excited. Which brings me to the first issue: bottoming out. The jumper hits a hard stop at the bottom when he jumps aggressively, and that jolt seems bad for his back and neck. The second issue is that the frame is squeaky. I would say that the first issue is a critical one that needs to be resolved, and the second is merely an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: dddvision

customer_reviews.title: ... my son turned 5 months as he was getting pretty bored with his other chairs/ activities
customer_reviews.text: We started using this right before my son turned 5 months as he was getting pretty bored with his other chairs/ activities. If he could, he would bounce in it all day! He loves the flashing lights and music. He even loves to stare at the fun print on the seat. I'm hoping he will continue to love this bouncer for a long time! It's a nice sturdy activity center. It does take up quite a bit of space, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it & watching her focusing on how the toys work is fascinating!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this thing! She plays with everything on it! When she’s happy, we’re happy! She loves “working” with all the little toys & to see her focusing and trying to figure out what it does is fun for me too!
customer_reviews.author: Becky M

customer_reviews.title: my kid loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: My kid started using this around four months when he could really hold his head up on his own. trying to put your kid in a jumperoo prior to head control is just awkward for everybody. It's been amazing to see him grow and discover the different toys/features in such a brief time. My baby can sit in this thing for an hour and a half and jump and amuse himself the entire time. As a first time parent I am overwhelmed with the amount of plastic stuff and toys flooding our house and taking up space. This is another one of those unsightly, large toys but I can't argue with the fact that my kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for baby - mommy gets work done!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old LOVES his jumperoo! Even before he could really engage in the toys he would stare and smile. He has started to jump and reach out and play with things. Even at the lowest setting I have to have a plastic box under so he can have his feet touching something. He is 98% for height, so he isn't a shorty. I see hours of fun here!
customer_reviews.author: Swardie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I bought it about 2 years ago and 2 kids have used it now. I always recommend to anyone. Super quick and easy to put together. Both my kids have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyria

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 6 months old and loves this jumperoo. She gets a wild look in her eyes and goes to town. Keeps her occupied for 30 mins so mommy can get some stuff done!
customer_reviews.author: THN

customer_reviews.title: Love this jumper
customer_reviews.text: Love this jumper. Our baby girl absolutely loves this thing. I can usually get a good 30 minutes of quiet time to get things done. I highly recommend. The only knock against it is that it's very big and awkward. Hard to move. So put it together in the room you will be keeping it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bardwell

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I waited to write a reviews on this
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I waited to write a reviews on this. At first I was going to give just an ok review, but as my baby keeps getting older (9 months old now) the more he loves it. He used to last 5 min or less before he wanted out, now he plays for long periods of time and is jumping and laughing the whole time. Based on the entertainment my son gets I have to give his a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bouncer for baby
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our grandson. The quality is what you would expect from Fisher-Price...top notch! It was easy to put together....actually you just snapped it together. It took about 5 minutes. We probably ordered it a little early for him at 4 months but he was a pretty big boy. He didn't fully grasp the concept until about 5 1/2 months old. Now he really loves it and will bounce and play in it for 30 minutes or more before getting bored. It is a great entertainment tool and exercise jumper also.
customer_reviews.author: MDCgator

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent jumper - it's easy to put together and is bright and colorful. However, my little one got bored very quickly as the activities are not very exciting and some of them are out of her reach. Also the music and sounds are incredibly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot bulkier then the picture. It’s big it’s toys are cute and fun but it’s to tall for my son no adjustment available.
customer_reviews.author: Oseida’s

customer_reviews.title: Great activity toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble; nice product. At just 3 months old, my little guy loves bouncing in this. I guess it is made for a little older baby as he could just touch with his toes...so had to put a pillow under it so he could be flat footed to bounce...Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: LarryS

customer_reviews.title: A Jumping Delight
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves this toy. It's his favorite at the moment. He was 14.25 lbs and 25.5 inches at his 4 month appointment and is now 4 1/2 months. His tip toes are what touches the floor but we put a blanket under him so he could rock and roll around and boy does he! His favorite part is the monkey and the red bird that spins - besides the bouncing craziness that ensues when he is put in it.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Had this shipped to our grandson in Colorado. My son (now 15) had a Jumperoo when he was a baby and it was his favorite thing ever! This new design didn't disappoint! Our grandbaby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Siajkk

customer_reviews.title: So excited to receive my new saw!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month grandson loves this! He was already a strong baby but I'm about to call him Bam Bam. He's gained so much more strength in his legs. Hand & eye coordination is developing rapidly through use of all the different toys. One of the best decisions we've made. Extremely happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ms MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: He loves this toy. Keeps him busy and he can definitely grow into the next stages as well. Was kind of annoying to assesmble, but didn’t take too long. The pieces just needed a good bang when putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Westlake

customer_reviews.title: Great product but has some issues.
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that this jumperoo is a great buy at a fantastic price. My complaints are that the leaves holding the hanging animals give too much and will break off if played with too much, not ideal for an infants toy aimed at them playing with the hanging toys. Also my other complaint is the upright portion of the stand moves and wiggles as if the connection to the bottom is loose. For the price, I was expecting a better quality and longevity. If those two issues were fixed that I would recommend this jumperoo to anyone, as of now, I recommend with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Over and Over Again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son when he was around four months old. At first we had to use a pillow underneath it since he couldn't really reach the floor on the lowest level, and used a balled up blanket to help him sit more upright. He grew and we no longer needed either props. This is hands down my sons favorite thing...ever. We go away for a night, and you can see how much he misses it. Great workout for them, and great to keep them occupied. I would buy this 100x over and over again. PS, assembly is SO easy. No tools needed!
customer_reviews.author: Abbye

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is great.. got for my nephew an he just LOVES to boumce to the sounds of this thing... keeps him entertaint lol
customer_reviews.author: Vivi77

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my son could hold his head up he HATED his swing, bouncy seat, rock n play and even the restrictive high chair, but boy oh boy does he LOVE his jumparoo!! Go to for gift for mom's to be now. My husband and I love this thing! Has music, lights, toys, 360 swivel seat, adjustable height, etc. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: melimm

customer_reviews.title: A must buy :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son when he was 4 months old. He liked it at first but it took him a little bit to figure out how to jump in it, and we had to put a few books under him so he could reach. He is now 5 months old and can reach the floor and loves to play in it. The music is fun (turns on when he jumps) and he likes to reach for the elephant. This jumperoo keeps him entertained for 30min-and hour while I clean or make dinner. A must buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great jumperoo, music doesn't turn on w/baby jumping
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves his Jumperoo! It's probably his favorite toy right now. I love how easy it is to clean the fabric seat. However, I'm pretty disappointed in the function that claims to start light, sound, and music when baby jumps. My little guy jumps around like crazy and has never been able to trigger it. Only time I've been able to get that going was when I shook the jumperoo (without him in it, obviously) pretty violently.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The Jumperoo is great for infants who aren't crawling yet, and who get bored quickly when set on the floor. My grandchildren entertain themselves for long periods of time, and love jumping up and down. Sometimes, though, the Little grandson doesn't know how to stop jumping, and we have to rescue him! The reason this product got four stars instead of five is that it is high up from the ground. I put pillows under it for the seven month old grandkids; their feet don't come close to reaching the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ann McCoy

customer_reviews.title: no regrets
customer_reviews.text: Love the jumper! My baby is 7 months old and I purchased it when she was 4 months old. She couldn't touch the ground until recently so we would put up something cushy for her to jump on. The doctor advised that we not put her in there longer than 10 minutes at a time until she was able to pull herself up on her own since up to that time babies use the tips of their feet to push and are not flat footed. I would definately buy this again, although I really don't understand why there is a snack tray on it. Who would put snacks on something that jumps around? All in all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: my baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son played it when he was about six months. He was so excited at the first time and the happiness continues till now, he is almost one year old. It is definitely worth buying. It gave me some time to do other things, cooking, etc, without baby screaming. However, it has a limitation for max. 25 pounds. Also, my son's legs will be hurt by the seat if he plays more than half hour because he is heavier than before. Overall it's a must-buy item in Fisher Price family.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has loved this thing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has loved this thing! Glad I got a "gender neutral" version because we'll soon be able to use it for our son, too. Only complaint is the plastic in the palm trees tend to wear when the toys have been pulled a lot, so I'm just waiting for them to snap off in a year or so. But I would still buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I personally love this bouncer
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this bouncer. I bought it for my first son about six years, and we just bought it again for my second son. It is a colorful and fun bouncer for the little ones, but what I specifically like about it is that it's not overwhelming. It has just enough to entertain and be exciting. The music is also fun, and both of my boys seemed to really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya G.

customer_reviews.title: This is my now 7 month old's favorite thing in the whole world( maybe after mommy)
customer_reviews.text: This is my now 7 month old's favorite thing in the whole world( maybe after mommy). Can't explain how much he loves it! The product arrived as expected. It was easy to assemble (had to read instructions, though). It has sounds and stuff to grab and roll and is the best thing I got for my LO yet. I have no proof, but I think all the jumping strengthened his legs and he has been using his walker since before he turned six months! Absolutely recommend it - especially to parents of boys!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisBand

customer_reviews.title: Love the attached teether that she can grab and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item for my baby and has held up well. Love the attached teether that she can grab and the animals are just far enough away that she can still try to grab but aren't in her way. Music stopped working after a few months. I changed the batteries and that doesn't seem to be the problem. I'm sure reaching out to Fisher Price directly they'll warranty. Overall happy with the product and the toys it comes with to provide entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dawdy

customer_reviews.title: It cut my baby's inner thigh
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this! My baby loved this toy at first but cried after a while init, we realized the in inside of the jumperaoo cut my baby's inner thigh!!! It was so red and scratched, I ran my finger through the rim and it was not smooth at all! I was very angry and frustrated! Please please don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: ahmad chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!! I got this for my 5-month-old and he's barely heavy enough to weigh it down and bounce, but he loves it. He can kick off with his toes. Within a few weeks, I know he's going to love it even more. Easy to set up and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Jump jump jump!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his jumper! It is slightly crooked but it could have been assembler error.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Really like this bouncy chair
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bouncy chair. Our granddaughter is 3 months old and gets tired of laying or being held. This is great to put her in (supported with soft cloth) so she has another option. Not meant for long time at this age but will be great as she ages with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Douglas

customer_reviews.title: My 6 Month Old Grandson Love This Item.
customer_reviews.text: This has become my 6 month old grandsons favorite thing to do. Easy assembly good quality and durable. He bounces for hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin H.

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Jumperoo: Luv U Zoo
product_meta.description:
Welcome to the Luv U Zoo! Everywhere baby looks (in the spinning seat, he can look all around!), there’s something fun to do with an animal friend—spinning, jumping, rattling and more! It’s safe jumping fun rewarded with lights, sounds and music! Developmental Guidelines: Use only for a child who is able to hold head upright unassisted and who is not able to walk or climb out of product. Moving and jumping enhance large motor skills. Variety of textures integrated into toys provide tactile stimulation. Colorful toys, fun sounds and music stimulate baby’s visual and auditory senses. Baby’s actions make things happen, helping baby understand cause and effect. Reaching and grasping onto toys fosters eye-hand coordination. Peace of mind—safe alternative to walkers and doorway jumpers. No doorway required. Easy storage—tubes simply pop off base! Requires 3 AA (not included).

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Baby’s jumping is rewarded with music, sounds, and lights
Seat spins 360 degrees so baby can discover the exciting activities all around
Sturdy, free-standing steel frame with 3 height adjustments—no doorways required!
Soft, comfy seat pad is machine washable & dryer safe
Maximum weight: 25 lbs (11,3 kg) Maximum height: 32 inches (81 cm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,306 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
